title: The Best Spring 2020 Runway Looks at London Fashion Week
text: This season Rocha paid homage to her Irish roots, feeling inspired by the Irish Wren Boys who traditionally hunted the Wren on St. Stephen's day. Rocha set the stage inside the recently restored Victorian theater Alexandra Palace. For spring, her organza's were embroidered with Anglaise daises and Mulberry berries, there were layered feather dresses. along with hand-macrame hay and raffia harnesses, in Rocha's signature exaggerated silhouettes. The designer also casted an array of Irish characters including actresses Olwen Fourere, Jessie Buckley, Simone Kirby, and Valene Kane just to name a few.
